text: Thomas W. "Tom" Ewing (born September 19, 1935) is an American Republican politician. He was born in Atlanta, Illinois. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives and the Illinois House of Representatives. Ewing was a state representative from 1974 to 1991, and a U.S. Congressman representing the 15th district of Illinois from July 2, 1991 until his retirement on January 3, 2001. ==Other websites== * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Illinois General Assembly
title: Thomas W. Ewing
